The notification’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Notification/object] is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCredentialStorage] instance that changed. # NSURLCredentialStorageChanged

**Type Property**

A notification posted when the set of stored credentials changes.

## Declaration

```swift
static let NSURLCredentialStorageChanged: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Notification/object] is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCredentialStorage] instance that changed. This notification does not contain a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Notification/userInfo] dictionary.
title: NSURLCredentialStorageChanged
